Iâ€™m a Genomic Sciences undergraduate student at the National Autonomous University of Mexico (UNAM) with a keen interest in computational biology and bioinformatics. In recent months Iâ€™ve been applying my knowledge to plant regulatory systems during development in Arabidopsis thaliana and in algorithm benchmarking (memory and time consumption) and assesment (potential method biases) for structural and topological comparison of complex networks.
I enjoy Python and Julia coding, specially for analyzing omic data sets with aim of capturing biologically and statistically relevant patterns.
